exceptions.exn: In environment A, B, C : Type R : relation A S : relation B T : relation C f : A -> B -> C equivR : equivalence R equivS : equivalence S equivT : equivalence T well_defined3 : forall (a1 a2 : A) (b1 b2 : B), R a1 a2 -> S b1 b2 -> T (f a1 b1) (f a2 b2) a : A b : B Unable to unify "exist (In (equiv_classes T)) (equiv_class T (f a b)) (equiv_class_in_quotient T (f a b))" with "induced_function2arg projf2 equivR equivS projf2_well_defined (exist (In (equiv_classes R)) (equiv_class R a) (equiv_class_in_quotient R a)) (exist (In (equiv_classes S)) (equiv_class S b) (equiv_class_in_quotient S b))".

original: intros a b. unfold induced_function3. unfold quotient_projection. reflexivity.
